column5: You'll deepen your knowledge of marine engineering and understand how it can be applied. Our master's in Marine Engineering covers topics associated with:ship propulsion machinery and transmissionship performancesystem reliability,condition monitoringelectrical systemsOur MSc is designed for both practising professionals and new graduates in subjects such as:civil engineeringmechanical engineeringnaval architectureoffshore engineeringocean engineeringmarine engineeringThis course meets the growing needs for engineers skilled in marine engineering. column9: 1-2 years Full time, 2 years Part time
